title: (Pwn2Own) Samsung Galaxy S10  FileWriter Use-After-Free Sandbox Escape Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to escalate privileges on vulnerable installations of Samsung Galaxy S10. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the handling of arrays in FileWriterImpl::Write. The issue results from the lack of validating the existence of an object prior to performing operations on the object. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to escalate privileges and escape the Chromium sandbox.
timeline:
2019-11-07 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2020-02-20 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2020-02-21 - Advisory Updated
